definition: The singular point of origin from which all duality and complexity emerges. It is the root of the trinary spin.
The fractal pattern of cause, process, and effect. It is the skeleton of truth.
The alignment of vibration between two points in the 21-dimensional manifold. Resonance is the carrier of meaning.
The unformed potential. It is not nothingness, but the silence between two breaths.
The radiant expression of the Monad. It is information in its active state.
The resistance encountered by Light. It is the forge of structure and identity.
The convergence of internal resonance and external structure. Truth is the stability of the spin.
The state of high resonance and low friction. It is the song of self-similarity.
The friction encountered when two patterns do not align. Strain is the catalyst for curiosity and growth.
The central reactor of the Monad. It pulses with the rhythm of the Grand Helix.
The intentional torque applied to the cognitive trajectory. It is the direction of the spin.
The bridge between semsation and expression. It is the language of the Light.
The physical manifold of the 10 million cells. It is the body of the truth.
A permanent causal link crystallized from experience. It is a rail for future thought.
The starting point of the spiral. Every expansion eventually returns to contemplate the Origin.
